text: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

translation.en.sahih: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
translation.id.indonesian: (Ingatlah) pada hari mereka diseret ke neraka atas muka mereka. (Dikatakan kepada mereka): "Rasakanlah sentuhan api neraka!"
